scenario.text: You encounter a street vendor selling boosters. What do you do?
scenario.rightEffect: player.morality += 2; return "You avoided trouble and preserved your morality.";

scenario.text: You come across a citizen trapped under debris. Do you risk your safety to help them?
scenario.rightEffect: player.infamy += 15; return "You left them behind, saving yourself but losing respect.";

scenario.text: A suspicious package lies in front of you. Do you open it?
A neighbor asks for help during a blackout. What do you do?
scenario.rightEffect: player.infamy += 2; return "You ignored the neighbor, slightly increasing your infamy.";

scenario.text: A vendor offers free VR sessions. Do you accept?
A hacker offers you secret information in VR. Do you log in?
scenario.rightEffect: player.morality += 5; return "You ignored the offer, preserving your moral standing.";

scenario.text: You receive a flyer for a rebel meeting. Do you attend?
An officer orders you to spy on a neighbor. What do you do?
scenario.leftEffect: player.infamy += 10; return "You reported your neighbor, increasing your infamy.";

scenario.text: You encounter street punks harassing civilians. What do you do?
scenario.rightEffect: player.infamy += 4; return "You walked away, but your reputation suffered.";

scenario.text: A N.E.O. patrol is chasing rebels nearby. What do you do?
scenario.rightEffect: player.infamy += 4; return "You hid, and your infamy increased slightly.";

scenario.text: You see a mural with a rebellious message. Do you add your own mark?
scenario.rightEffect: return "You chose not to engage, leaving the mural untouched.";

scenario.text: A corrupt officer offers you a bribe to overlook minor infractions. Do you pay?
scenario.rightEffect: player.morality += 3; return "You refused, maintaining your principles.";

scenario.text: A shady dealer offers you experimental pills. Do you buy them?
scenario.rightEffect: return "You wisely declined, avoiding potential harm.";

scenario.text: A mysterious figure offers you a cybernetic upgrade. Do you accept?
scenario.rightEffect: return "You chose to remain unchanged.";

scenario.text: You are offered the chance to donate blood for a reward. Do you donate?
scenario.rightEffect: return "You declined to donate.";

scenario.text: A local sports event invites you to participate. Do you join?
scenario.rightEffect: return "You chose not to participate.";

scenario.text: A community fundraiser is underway. Do you contribute?
scenario.rightEffect: return "You did not contribute.";

scenario.text: You witness a gang vandalizing public property. Do you report them?
scenario.leftEffect: player.morality += 4; return "You reported the incident, upholding the law.";
scenario.rightEffect: player.infamy += 3; return "You ignored it, and your reputation suffered.";

scenario.text: A gang invites you to participate in a heist. Do you join?
scenario.rightEffect: player.morality += 3; return "You refused, preserving your integrity.";

scenario.text: Your location is compromised. Do you take a risky shortcut?
scenario.rightEffect: return "You chose the safe route with no major changes.";

scenario.text: A local market collapses. Do you help rebuild or exploit the chaos?
scenario.rightEffect: player.infamy += 5; return "You exploited the chaos, increasing your notoriety.";

scenario.text: You find a lost wallet on the street. Do you return it?
scenario.rightEffect: player.infamy += 5; return "You kept the wallet, staining your reputation.";

scenario.text: A local leader invites you to give a speech. Do you accept?
scenario.rightEffect: player.reputation -= 2; return "Your absence was noted.";

scenario.text: You overhear a secret meeting of influential figures. Do you eavesdrop?
scenario.leftEffect: player.infamy += 5; return "You gathered valuable information.";
scenario.rightEffect: return "You chose not to get involved.";

scenario.text: A local charity asks for volunteers. Do you help out?
scenario.rightEffect: return "You declined to help.";

scenario.text: You have a chance to buy rare tech on the black market. Do you purchase it?
scenario.rightEffect: return "You decided against the risk.";

scenario.text: Authorities announce an online raid targeting cyber-criminals. Do you cover your tracks?
scenario.leftEffect: player.infamy += 8; return "You covered your tracks and avoided detection.";
scenario.rightEffect: player.infamy += 4; return "Your inaction cost you dearly.";

scenario.text: A seasoned veteran offers to mentor you. Do you accept?
scenario.rightEffect: return "You missed out on valuable guidance.";

scenario.text: A family member reaches out for help. Do you assist them?
scenario.rightEffect: player.reputation -= 4; return "Your inaction hurt your reputation.";

scenario.text: You face a final critical decision. Do you choose the path of redemption or corruption?
scenario.leftEffect: player.morality = 100; return "Your choice for redemption makes you a local hero.";
scenario.rightEffect: player.infamy = 100; return "Your corrupt path brands you as a notorious criminal.";
